description: Logical reasoning, critical thinking, and problem-solving questions

questions.question: If all roses are flowers and some flowers fade quickly, can we conclude that some roses fade quickly?
questions.expected_answer: No, we cannot conclude that definitively

questions.question: What comes next in the sequence: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
If a car travels 60 miles in 1 hour, how far does it travel in 30 minutes at the same speed?
Which is heavier: a pound of feathers or a pound of rocks?
If it takes 5 machines 5 minutes to make 5 widgets, how long would it take 100 machines to make 100 widgets?
Complete the analogy: Hand is to glove as foot is to ?
If all bloops are razzies and all razzies are lazzies, are all bloops definitely lazzies?
What number comes next: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ?
A doctor gives you three pills and tells you to take one every half hour. How long will the pills last?
If you have a 5-liter jug and a 3-liter jug, how can you measure exactly 4 liters?
questions.expected_answer: Fill 5L, pour into 3L (leaving 2L), empty 3L, pour 2L into 3L, fill 5L again, fill remaining 1L of 3L jug from 5L jug (leaving 4L)

questions.question: What is the opposite of 'always'?
If some Xs are Ys and no Ys are Zs, can an X be a Z?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, possible for Xs that are not Ys

questions.question: If today is Monday, what day was it 100 days ago?
You have 12 balls, one is slightly heavier. Using a balance scale only 3 times, how can you find it?
questions.expected_answer: Divide into groups of 4, compare groups, then subdivide

questions.question: What comes next: A, C, F, J, ?
Is the statement 'This statement is false' true or false?
questions.expected_answer: Paradox - it cannot be consistently true or false

questions.question: If you overtake the person in second place in a race, what position are you in?
Complete the analogy: Cat is to kitten as dog is to ?
How many months have 28 days?
What is the next letter: J, F, M, A, M, J, ?
If allAs are Bs, and all Bs are Cs, then all As are definitely Cs. True or false?
A bat and ball cost $1.10 total. The bat costs $1 more than the ball. How much does the ball cost?
What has keys but no locks, space but no room, and you can enter but can't go inside?
If 2 + 2 = fish and 3 + 3 = eight, what is 7 + 7?
questions.expected_answer: Triangle (visual pattern of numbers forming shapes)

questions.question: What building has the most stories?
If there are 3 apples and you take away 2, how many do you have?
A farmer has 17 sheep, and all but 9 die. How many are left?
Complete the analogy: Day is to night as summer is to ?
What is always in front of you but can't be seen?
If some cats are black and some black things are scary, are some cats scary?
What comes next: 100, 50, 25, 12.5, ?
What gets wet while drying?
If you're running a race and you pass the person in last place, what place are you in?
What has hands but cannot clap?
If no birds are fish and some fish can swim, can a bird swim?
What goes up but never comes down?
Complete the analogy: Up is to down as hot is to ?
A rooster lays an egg on top of a barn roof. Which way does it roll?
What has a head and a tail but no body?
If all squares are rectangles but not all rectangles are squares, is this logically consistent?
What comes next: O, T, T, F, F, S, S, ?
questions.expected_answer: E (first letters of One, Two, Three...)

questions.question: What breaks when you say it?
If a plane crashes on the border of two countries, where do you bury the survivors?
Complete: 1, 8, 27, 64, ?
What can travel around the world while staying in one corner?
If P implies Q, and Q implies R, does P imply R?
What has many teeth but cannot bite?
